## mapAsync() function

Maps the values in an array asynchronously.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapAsync<T1, T2>(// tslint:disable-line:export-name
array: T1[], callback: (value: T1, index: number, array: T1[]) => Promise<T2>): Promise<T2[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T1[]</code> | the array to map |
|  callback | <code>(value: T1, index: number, array: T1[]) =&gt; Promise&lt;T2&gt;</code> | the asynchronous map function |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<T2[]>`

the mapped array
